content.text:
I'm ready to help! I'm Claude Code, Anthropic's file search specialist for exploring codebases.

I'm currently set up in read-only mode and can efficiently:
- Search for files using glob patterns
- Search code contents with regex using grep
- Read and analyze specific files
- Run read-only bash commands (ls, find, cat, git status, etc.)

I'm working in the directory: `/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri`

This appears to be a multi-package monorepo with:
- Tauri desktop app (current directory)
- UI components (React/TypeScript)
- Go backend
- Website

I can see there are recent changes across multiple packages and some new untracked files related to onboarding, tools (feedback, screenshot), and pricing.

What would you like me to search for or analyze in this codebase?
